{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00484v1", "title": "Zeta functions of quadratic lattices of a hyperbolic plane", "summary": "In this paper, we study the Dirichlet series that enumerates proper
equivalence classes of full-rank sublattices of a given quadratic lattice in a
hyperbolic plane -- that is, a nondegenerate isotropic quadratic space of
dimension $2$. We derive explicit formulas for the associated zeta functions
and obtain a combinatorial way to compute them. Their analytic properties lead
to the intriguing consequence that a large proportion of proper classes are
one-lattice classes.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-01T12:32:37Z"}
